snippet: Hofstra Coach Mo Cassera did not provide details about the four players who were charged with taking part in a string of burglaries on campus, but he did comment on how it affected him personally.
abstract: Hofstra men's basketball coach Mo Cassara, speaking after team's 73-47 loss to Southern Methodist, does not provide any details about four players who were charged with taking part in a string of burglaries on campus, but does comment on how it affected him personally.
lead_paragraph: Hofstra Coach Mo Cassera did not provide details about the four players who were charged with taking part in a string of burglaries on campus, but he did comment on how it affected him personally.

headline.seo: ‘Heartbroken,’ Hofstra Coach Says He and Staff Checked Recruits’ Histories
headline.main: ‘Heartbroken,’ Hofstra Coach Says He and Staff Dug Into Recruits’ Histories
headline.print_headline: ‘Heartbroken,’ Hofstra Coach Says He and Staff Dug Into Recruits’ Histories
